document_api_meta.title: Update Activity Product
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to add the products or SKUs to the list of a product discount activity or a flash deal activity. You can also change the discounts on existing products or SKUs. To remove the products or SKUs from the list, use [Remove Activity Product](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650acfd84a0bb702c072b4eb).

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: products
request_body_param.desc: The items to add to the list or the existing items in the list of promotion activity to edit. The length must not exceed `300`.

request_body_param.name: ^activity_price_amount
request_body_param.desc:
Deal price. 
You must specify the value when `product_level==PRODUCT` and `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE`. The currency is the same between activity price and product price.

request_body_param.name: ^discount
request_body_param.desc:
Discount value. If the product is 10% off, the value is `10`.
You must specify the value when `product_level==PRODUCT` and `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT`; and you must not specify it when it's not.

request_body_param.name: ^quantity_limit
request_body_param.desc:
The quantity limit of the products involved in the activity. The range is `[1, 99]`, or you can use `-1` for unlimited. If you are updating the value of an existing product, the value cannot be less than the current value.
When `product_level==VARIATION`, you must specify `-1`.

request_body_param.name: ^quantity_per_user
request_body_param.desc:
Limit of product purchase per buyer. The range is `[1, 99]`, or you can use `-1` for unlimited. If you are updating the value of an existing product, the value cannot be less than the current value.
When `product_level==VARIATION`, you must specify `-1`.

request_body_param.name: ^skus
request_body_param.desc:
The SKUs to add to the list or to edit. The number of the SKUs across all products must not exceed 300 in an API call.
You must specify the value to `[]` when `product_level==PRODUCT`.

request_body_param.name: ^^activity_price_amount
request_body_param.desc:
Deal price. 
You must specify the value when `product_level==VARIATION` and `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE`. The currency of activity price is the same as that of SKU price.

request_body_param.name: ^^discount
request_body_param.desc:
Discount value. If the SKU is 10% off, the value is `10`.
You must specify the value when `product_level==VARIATION` and `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT`.

request_body_param.name: ^^quantity_limit
request_body_param.desc: The quantity limit of the SKU involved in the activity. The range is `[1, 99]`, or you can use `-1` for unlimited. If you are updating the value of an existing SKU, the value cannot be decreased.

request_body_param.name: ^^quantity_per_user
request_body_param.desc: Limit of SKU purchase per buyer. The range is `[1, 99]`, or you can use `-1` for unlimited. If you are updating the value of an existing SKU, the value cannot be decreased.

request_body_param.name: activity_id
request_body_param.desc:
A unique ID that identifies activities.
You cannot update the products in `DEACTIVATED` or `EXPIRED` activities.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^activity_id
response_param.desc: A unique ID that identifies different activities.

response_param.name: ^title
response_param.desc: Activity name set by the merchant.

response_param.name: ^status
response_param.desc:
Activity status.
Possible values:
- DRAFT: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users.
- NOT_START: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users until the set activity start time.
- ONGOING: Promotion activities with this status are available to TikTok users.
- EXPIRED: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users because it has expired.
- DEACTIVATED: The activity has been deactivated by the seller and is not available to TikTok users.
- NOT_EFFECTIVE:  The activity is terminated by the platform and is not available to TikTok users.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc:
The number of items in this request.
When `product_level==PRODUCT`, it's the number of products; when `product_level==VARIATION`, it's the number of SKUs across products.

error_code_list.msg: Promotion title cannot be a duplicate.
Internal system error, please try again later.
Invalid parameters
Activity does not exist
Activity is deactivated
Not allowed to update expired activities
`sku` must be `[]` for activities of which `product_level==PRODUCT`.
The value of `quantity_per_user` is out of range.
When `product_level==VARIATION`, the value of `quantity_limit` must be `-1`.
Invalid SKU ID.
You are specifying products not in your shop.
The provided SKU quantity is greater than the available stock.
The provided product quantity is greater than the available stock.
Product discount exceeds limit. The limit varies based on products and regions.
SKU discount exceeds limit. The limit varies based on products and regions.
The product or SKU cannot be in two `ONGOING` or `NOT_START` activities at the same time.
The quantity of the products or the SKUs included in the activity exceeds `10000`.
Invalid SellerID
You are specifying activities not in your shop.
You are incorrectly specifying `activity_price_amount` instead of `discount` when `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT` and `product_level==PRODUCT`.
You are incorrectly specifying `discount` instead of `activity_price_amount` when `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE` and `product_level==PRODUCT`.
You are incorrectly specifying `activity_price_amount` instead of `discount` when `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT` and `product_level==VARIATION`.
You are incorrectly specifying `discount` instead of `activity_price_amount` when `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE` and `product_level==VARIATION`.
`products` is empty.
`activity_price_amount` is invalid.
`skus` is empty when `product_level==VARIATION`.
When `product_level==VARIATION`, you must not specify `product.activity_price_amount` and `product.discount`.
Duplicate product ID.
Duplicate SKU ID.
You must specify `product.discount` when `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT` and `product_level==PRODUCT`.
You must specify `product.activity_price_amount` when `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE` and `product_level==PRODUCT`.
You must specify `sku.discount` when `activity_type==DIRECT_DISCOUNT` and `product_level==VARIATION`.
You must specify `sku.activity_price_amount` when `activity_type==FIXED_PRICE / FLASHSALE` and `product_level==VARIATION`.
Duplicated RequestSerialNo.
Number of items per request exceeds the limit.
An `ONGOING` flash sale product cannot be updated.
An `ONGOING` flash sale SKU cannot be updated.
ActivityVersion is not supported.
The value of `quantity_limit` and `quantity_per_user` must be `-1` or in the range of `[1, 99]`.
Product ID not found.
The SKU ID does not match the product ID.
Please limit the request frequency.
Request Timeout
Invalid product status.
Unable to decrease buyer/num PurchaseLimit.
The Categories of products is invalid
Discount is below the limit, please confirm.
SKU discount is below the limit, please confirm.
Product is non-sellable.
Target quota is less than the initial quota.
Limit info cannot be changed or modified.
Auction products are not eligible for promotions.
Access denied. This activity does not belong to this shop and therefore cannot be modified.
Eligible products and the gift products must not be the same product.
Product is already assigned in another conflicting promotion.
Partial of products have already been applied to another conflict promotion during the selected period.
The product(s) selected have already been applied to another buy more save more promotion during the selected period. To proceed, edit the product list or change the promotion period.
The number of products will exceed the maximum number of the promotion.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func promotion202309UpdateActivityProductPut() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.PromotionV202309API.Promotion202309ActivitiesActivityIdProductsPut(context.Background(), "7402881377634567979")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody()
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts()
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetId("7135427619356477189")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetActivityPriceAmount("4.5")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetDiscount("10")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetQuantityLimit(-1)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetQuantityPerUser(-1)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus()
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus.SetId("7125688837187176194")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus.SetActivityPriceAmount("6.5")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus.SetDiscount("10")
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus.SetQuantityLimit(-1)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus.SetQuantityPerUser(10)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkusList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus{*promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkus}
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts.SetSkus(promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsSkusList)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts{*promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProducts}
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody.SetProducts(promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBodyProductsList)
    promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody.SetActivityId("7136104288010372865")
    request = request.Promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody(*promotion202309UpdateActivityProductRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to create and manage seller's discounts and promotions on TikTok Shop.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to create and manage your discounts and promotions on TikTok Shop.
